Steve Ballmer said the partnership with Nokia, which will see the world's largest mobile phone manufacturer shifting to Windows Phone as its operating system, will help accelerate its adoption. Nokia's involvement with Windows Phone will drive volume, innovation of new products, and will accelerate adoption of the Windows Phone platform, said the Microsoft chief.
